welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sittwe, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful sunsets. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this vibrant city has to offer during your time here.

restaurants.name: Gisspanadi Seafood Restaurant
restaurants.description: Gisspanadi Seafood Restaurant is a seafood restaurant located in the city.
restaurants.address: Near City Hall, Minbargyi Road, Sittwe
